description.english: Beat the first level of the game.
description.italian: Hai superato il primo livello del gioco.
description.german: Schließe den ersten Level des Spiels ab.
description.spanish: Completa el primer nivel del juego.
description.brazilian: Vença a primeira fase do jogo.
description.japanese: 最初のレベルをクリアしよう。

description.english: Beat the second level of the game.
description.italian: Hai superato il secondo livello del gioco.
description.german: Schließe den zweiten Level des Spiels ab.
description.spanish: Completa el segundo nivel del juego.
description.brazilian: Vença a segunda fase do jogo.
description.japanese: 2番目のレベルをクリアしよう。

description.english: Beat the third level of the game.
description.italian: Hai superato il terzo livello del gioco.
description.german: Schließe den dritten Level des Spiels ab.
description.spanish: Completa el tercer nivel del juego.
description.brazilian: Vença a terceira fase do jogo.
description.japanese: 3番目のレベルをクリアしよう。

description.english: Beat the fourth level of the game.
description.italian: Hai superato il quarto livello del gioco.
description.german: Schließe den vierten Level des Spiels ab.
description.spanish: Completa el cuarto nivel del juego.
description.brazilian: Vença a quarta fase do jogo.
description.japanese: 4番目のレベルをクリアしよう。

description.english: Beat the fifth level of the game.
description.italian: Hai superato il quinto livello del gioco.
description.german: Schließe den fünften Level des Spiels ab.
description.spanish: Completa el quinto nivel del juego.
description.brazilian: Vença a quinta fase do jogo.
description.japanese: 5番目のレベルをクリアしよう。

description.english: Beat the sixth level of the game.
description.italian: Hai superato il sesto livello del gioco.
description.german: Schließe den sechsten Level des Spiels ab.
description.spanish: Completa el sexto nivel del juego.
description.brazilian: Vença a sexta fase do jogo.
description.japanese: 6番目のレベルをクリアしよう。

description.english: Beat the seventh level of the game.
description.italian: Hai superato il settimo livello del gioco.
description.german: Schließe den siebten Level des Spiels ab.
description.spanish: Completa el séptimo nivel del juego.
description.brazilian: Vença a sétima fase do jogo.
description.japanese: 7番目のレベルをクリアしよう。

description.english: Beat the eight level of the game.
description.italian: Hai superato l'ottavo livello del gioco.
description.german: Schließe den achten Level des Spiels ab.
description.spanish: Completa el octavo nivel del juego.
description.brazilian: Vença a oitava fase do jogo.
description.japanese: 8番目のレベルをクリアしよう。

description.english: Beat the final level of the game.
description.french: Termine le dernier niveau du jeu.
description.italian: Hai superato il livello finale del gioco.
description.german: Schließe den letzten Level des Spiels ab.
description.spanish: Completa el último nivel del juego.
description.brazilian: Vença a fase final do jogo.
description.japanese: 最後のレベルをクリアしよう。

description.english: Find all the secret treasures.
description.italian: Trova tutti i tesori nascosti.
description.german: Finde alle geheimen Schätze.
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los tesoros secretos.
description.brazilian: Encontre todos os tesouros secretos.
description.japanese: 秘密の宝物をすべて見つけよう。

displayName.japanese: ローカルピックアップ

description.english: Use the boomerang to collect an item.
description.french: Utilise le boomerang pour collecter un objet.
description.italian: Usa il boomerang per prendere un oggetto.
description.german: Sammle mit dem Bumerang einen Gegenstand ein.
description.spanish: Usa el bumerán para recoger un objeto.
description.brazilian: Use o bumerangue para coletar um item.
description.japanese: ブーメランを使ってアイテムを収集しよう。
description.turkish: Bir öğeyi almak için bumerang kullan.

description.english: Jump from a frozen enemy.
description.italian: Salta da un nemico congelato.
description.german: Springe von einem gefrorenen Gegner.
description.spanish: Salta desde un enemigo congelado.
description.brazilian: Salte de um adversário congelado.
description.schinese: 从冻住的敌人身上跳起。
description.japanese: 凍りついた敵から飛び降りよう。

description.english: Jump over 15 spiders.
description.italian: Salta su 15 ragni.
description.german: Springe über 15 Spinnen.
description.spanish: Salta sobre 15 arañas.
description.brazilian: Salte sobre 15 aranhas.
description.japanese: 15匹のクモを飛び越えよう。

description.english: Defeat 200 enemies.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 200 nemici.
description.german: Besiege 200 Gegner.
description.spanish: Derrota a 200 enemigos.
description.brazilian: Derrote 200 inimigos.
description.japanese: 200体の敵を倒そう。

description.english: Defeat one of every type of enemy.
description.french: Élimine un ennemi de chaque type.
description.italian: Sconfiggi ogni tipo di nemico.
description.german: Besiege einen Gegner jedes Typs.
description.spanish: Derrota a todos los tipos de enemigos.
description.brazilian: Derrote um inimigo de cada tipo.
description.russian: Победи по одному врагу каждого типа.
description.schinese: 将每种类型的敌人击败一个。
description.japanese: 各種類の敵を1体ずつ倒そう。
description.koreana: 모든 종류 중 한 가지 적을 물리칩니다.
description.turkish: Her düşman türünden bir tane yen.

description.english: Make an enemy defeat another enemy.
description.french: Arrange-toi pour qu'un ennemi élimine un de ses alliés.
description.italian: Fai in modo che un nemico sconfigga un altro nemico.
description.german: Bringe einen Gegner dazu, einen anderen Gegner zu besiegen.
description.spanish: Haz que un enemigo derrote a otro enemigo.
description.brazilian: Faça um inimigo seu derrotar outro inimigo.
description.russian: Сделай, чтобы враг победил другого врага.
description.schinese: 让一个敌人击败另一个敌人。
description.japanese: 敵に別の敵を倒させよう。
description.turkish: Bir düşmanın başka düşmanı yoketmesini sağla.

description.english: Buy something in the shop.
description.french: Achète quelque chose à la boutique.
description.italian: Compra qualcosa nel negozio.
description.german: Kaufe etwas im Shop.
description.spanish: Compra algo en la tienda.
description.brazilian: Compre alguma coisa na loja.
description.japanese: ショップで何かを買おう。

description.english: Buy 5 different items in the shop.
description.french: Achète 5 objets différents à la boutique.
description.italian: Compra 5 oggetti diversi nel negozio.
description.german: Kaufe 5 unterschiedliche Gegenstände im Shop.
description.spanish: Compra 5 objetos distintos en la tienda.
description.brazilian: Compre 5 itens diferentes na loja.
description.schinese: 在商店中购买 5 种不同物品。
description.japanese: ショップで5つの異なるアイテムを買おう。

description.english: Use the bottle to refill a weapon.
description.french: Utilise la potion pour recharger une arme.
description.italian: Usa l'ampolla per ricaricare un'arma.
description.german: Lade mit der Flasche eine Waffe nach.
description.spanish: Usa la botella para rellenar un arma.
description.brazilian: Use a garrafa para recarregar uma arma.
description.russian: Воспользуйся флаконом для пополнения энергии оружия.
description.schinese: 使用武器瓶重新装填武器。
description.japanese: ボトルを使って武器を再装弾しよう。

description.english: Use A special item to walk on spikes.
description.french: Utilise un objet spécial pour marcher sur des pointes.
description.italian: Usa un oggetto speciale per camminare sulle punte.
description.german: Benutze einen Spezialgegenstand, um über Stachel zu gehen.
description.spanish: Usa un objeto especial para caminar sobre pinchos.
description.brazilian: Use um item especial para andar em espinhos.
description.russian: Используй спецпредмет, чтобы ходить по шипам.
description.schinese: 使用特殊道具后在尖刺上行走。
description.japanese: スペシャルアイテムを使って釘の上を歩こう。
description.koreana: 스페셜 아이템을 사용하여 스파이크 위를 걷습니다.
description.turkish: Özel bir şey kullanarak çivilerin üstünde yürü.

description.english: Break 100 blocks.
description.italian: Distruggi 100 blocchi.
description.german: Zerbrich 100 Blöcke.
description.spanish: Rompe 100 bloques.
description.brazilian: Quebre 100 blocos.
description.japanese: 100個のブロックを壊そう。

description.english: Die 30 times.
description.italian: Muori 30 volte.
description.german: Stirb 30-mal.
description.spanish: Muere 30 veces.
description.brazilian: Morra 30 vezes.
description.japanese: 30回死のう。

description.english: Reach a boss room without taking damage.
description.french: Atteins une salle de boss sans encaisser de dégâts.
description.italian: Raggiungi un boss senza subire danni.
description.german: Erreiche einen Boss-Raum, ohne Schaden zu erleiden.
description.spanish: Llega a una sala de jefe sin recibir daños.
description.brazilian: Chegue a uma sala de chefe sem sofrer dano.
description.russian: Дойди до комнаты босса, не понеся урон.
description.schinese: 不受伤状况下抵达关底房间。
description.japanese: ダメージを受けずにボスの部屋にたどり着こう。
description.turkish: Hiç hasar almadan boss odasına ulaş.

description.english: Reach a boss room without defeating any enemies.
description.french: Atteins une salle de boss sans éliminer le moindre ennemi.
description.italian: Raggiungi un boss senza sconfiggere alcun nemico.
description.german: Erreiche einen Boss-Raum, ohne Gegner besiegt zu haben.
description.spanish: Llega a una sala de jefe sin derrotar a ningún enemigo.
description.brazilian: Chegue a uma sala de chefe sem derrotar inimigos.
description.russian: Дойди до комнаты босса, не победив ни одного врага.
description.schinese: 不击败任何敌人状况下抵达关底房间。
description.japanese: 敵を1体も倒さずにボスの部屋にたどり着こう。
description.koreana: 적을 하나도 물리치지 않고 보스룸에 도달합니다.
description.tchinese: 到魔王關時沒擊倒敵人
description.turkish: Hiçbir düşmanı yenmeden boss odasına ulaş.

description.english: Defeat a boss in under 30 seconds.
description.french: Bats un boss en moins de 30 secondes.
description.italian: Sconfiggi un boss in meno di 30 secondi.
description.german: Besiege einen Boss in weniger als 30 Sekunden.
description.spanish: Derrota a un jefe en menos de 30 segundos.
description.brazilian: Derrote um chefe em menos de 30 segundos.
description.russian: Победи босса менее чем за 30 секунд.
description.schinese: 在 30 秒以内击败关底。
description.japanese: 30秒未満でボスを倒そう。

description.english: Defeat a boss with only one heart left.
description.french: Bats un boss avec un seul cœur restant.
description.italian: Sconfiggi un boss con un solo cuore rimasto.
description.german: Besiege einen Boss, während du nur noch ein Herz übrig hast.
description.spanish: Derrota a un jefe con solo un corazón restante.
description.brazilian: Derrote um chefe com apenas uma vida restante.
description.russian: Победи босса с одним оставшимся сердцем.
description.schinese: 在仅剩一颗心的状况下击败关底。
description.japanese: ハート1つだけを残してボスを倒そう。
description.koreana: 하트가 하나만 남은 상태에서 보스를 물리칩니다.
description.tchinese: 剩下一顆愛心擊敗魔王
description.turkish: Bir boss'u sadece bir kalp kalarak yen.

description.english: Defeat the boss without losing energy.
description.french: Bats un boss sans perdre d'énergie.
description.italian: Sconfiggi un boss senza perdere energia.
description.german: Besiege den Boss, ohne Energie zu verlieren.
description.spanish: Derrota a un jefe sin perder energía.
description.brazilian: Derrote o chefe sem perder energia.
description.schinese: 不使用任何能量击败关底。
description.japanese: エネルギーを失わずにボスを倒そう。
description.turkish: Bir boss'u hiç enerji kaybetmeden yen.

description.english: Defeat Teklov part II without collecting all the treasures.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Teklov nel secondo scontro, senza raccogliere tutti i tesori.
description.german: Besiege Teklov (Teil II), ohne alle Schätze einzusammeln.
description.spanish: Derrota a Teklov (2.ª parte) sin recoger todos los tesoros.
description.brazilian: Derrote Teklov parte II sem recolher todos os tesouros.
description.russian: Победи Теклова, часть II, не собрав все сокровища.
description.schinese: 与 Teklov 进行第二次战斗而不收集任何财宝。
description.japanese: 宝物を手に入れずにテクロフIIを倒そう。
description.koreana: 보물을 하나도 모으지 않고 테크로프와 파트 II를 물리칩니다.
description.tchinese: 在沒有取得所有寶藏的情況下擊敗鐵克洛夫第二關
description.turkish: Tüm hazineleri toplamadan Teklov bölüm II'yi geç.

description.english: Deal the final hit on Teklov using the shield.
description.french: Inflige le coup de grâce à Teklov en utilisant le bouclier.
description.italian: Infliggi il colpo finale a Teklov, usando lo scudo.
description.german: Füge Teklov den finalen Treffer mit dem Schild zu.
description.spanish: Dale el golpe de gracia a Teklov con el escudo.
description.brazilian: Dê o golpe final em Teklov usando o escudo.
description.russian: Нанеси последний удар по Теклову с помощью щита.
description.schinese: 使用盾牌对 Teklov 进行最后一击。
description.japanese: シールドなしでテクロフにとどめを刺そう。
description.koreana: 방패를 사용하여 테크로프에게 최후의 한 방을 날립니다.
description.tchinese: 使用盾牌給予鐵克洛夫最後一擊
description.turkish: Teklov'da son darbeyi vurmak için kalkanı kullan.

displayName.japanese: テクロフをノックダウン

description.english: Clear the game on normal.
description.italian: Completa il gioco al livello di difficoltà normale.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel auf
description.spanish: Completa el juego en modo Normal.
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo em modo normal.
description.russian: Пройди игру на нормальном уровне сложности.
description.japanese: ノーマルモードをクリアしよう。

description.english: Clear the game in under 45 minutes.
description.french: Termine le jeu en moins de 45 minutes.
description.italian: Completa il gioco in meno di 45 minuti.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel in weniger als 45 Minuten ab.
description.spanish: Completa en juego en menos de 45 minutos.
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo em menos de 45 minutos.
description.russian: Пройди игру менее чем за 45 минут.
description.schinese: 在 45 分钟内完成游戏。
description.japanese: 45分未満でゲームをクリアしよう。

description.english: Clear the game on hard
description.italian: Completa il gioco al livello di difficoltà difficile.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel auf
description.spanish: Completa el juego en modo Difícil.
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo em modo difícil.
description.russian: Пройди игру на высоком уровне сложности.
description.japanese: ハードモードをクリアしよう。
